content.text:
# Ministry of Agriculture and Food Security (South Sudan)

The Ministry of Agriculture and Food Security in South Sudan is a ministry in the current Revitalised Transitional Government of National Unity. The sitting minister is Josephine Joseph Lagu, daughter of veteran politician, Joseph Lagu; while Lily Albino Akol Akol  serves as the [https://onecitizendaily.com/index.php/2022/06/18/insecurity-halts-agricultural-productivity/ Deputy Minister of Agriculture and Food Security].
